participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Resilient and nurturing, with a creative flair for sewing and a strong familial bond.
participant_1.background: i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes. i've amazing children and grandchildren. i do not have a smartphone.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, with a passion for exploring new cuisines and cultures.
participant_2.background: i've been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. hey there i am 23 and i love food.
